body_html:
@ezyang So although a few builds are failing, it seems that test_jit is preserved now.
One build fails because it's not a CUDA machine and some tests require CUDA, that's fine.
However I can't parse the errors on the pr/pytorch-linux-xenial-py3-clang5-asan build (https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-py3-clang5-asan-build/1101/consoleFull).
Any suggestion would be very useful.

@apaszke I added Catch as a submodule, it looks like it's working. Now we should do the same for ATen, but I guess that has to be done separately on the ATen repository.
